question: A plumber works for 3 weeks every month and for 7 days every week. If he gets paid $145 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The plumber works for 7 days every week and works for 3 weeks every month so he works for 7 days/week * 3 weeks/month = <<7*3=21>>21 days/month
If he earns $145 every day he then earns $145/day * 21 days/month = $<<145*21=3045>>3045/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $3045/month * 12 months/year = $<<3045*12=36,540>>36,540
#### 36,540
